channel.title: Programming Puzzles on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in Programming Puzzles on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Coding Puzzle in F#: Find the Number of Islands
item.description: Here’s a programming puzzle. Given 2D matrix of 0’s and 1’s, find the number of islands. A group of connected 1’s forms an island. For example, the below matrix contains 5 islands

item.title: My Praise of Advent of Code 2016
item.description: During the last days of December I was pleasing my internal need for solving puzzles and tricky tasks by going through Advent of Code 2016 challenge.
